channel.title: World Cup 2018 on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in World Cup 2018 on Rusland 1

item.title: In Your Face: Russian Face Tattoos
item.description: Rappers Face, Kizaru, Ганвест, Morgenshtern (who regrets it), Скруджи and many more. All of them have tattoos на лице (on their faces). It sometimes seems more important than their skills. So far, only men are listed. No female Russian rapper with a face tattoo has been found (yet).

item.title: Clichés & Prejudices (About Russia & Russians)
item.description: Inventories below, sometimes with responses or rebuttals. Stereotypes about Russians | Learn Russian with movies (Hack Your Russian, 2020, 11 m) Street Interviews with Russians – Stereotypes About Russia (RussianPlus, 2019, 28 m) More about Russians than About Russia, but still relevant here.
